About Me

A brief information about me...

PROFILE

I am a friendly, inquisitive, and versatile person with good knowledge in Wireless Systems, PCB Design, Maintenance, Installation and Configuration of Technology Systems, Measurement, Testing and Verification of Electronic Design. A zeal to learn new things and a fast learner. Looking towards a career in 5G Networks, Cloud Computing and Software Development.

SKILLS

  • Word Processing: Microsoft word/Excel/PowerPoint
  • Operating Systems: Windows, CentOS
  • Programming: Matlab, Python, C/C++, Labview
  • Telecom: 5G, UMTS, LTE, GSM, IoT, LAN/WAN/WLAN
  • Software Development: HTML, SASS, JavaScrpt, React, MongoDB, NodeJS Environment
  • Cloud: Google Cloud Platform
  • Design: PCB, VHDL, FPGA
  • Tools: VS code, Github, CAD, NI Multisim, Notepad++, Modelsim,
